welcome_message_body: Welcome to Jinghong, the heart of the enchanting Xishuangbanna region in China. Known for its lush tropical landscapes, vibrant ethnic culture, and delicious local cuisine, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the unique charm of this beautiful city. Enjoy your stay!
